dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright violation]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: Ron Williams [mailto:ron@ronsnexus.com] Posted At: Friday, June 16, 2006 9:22 PM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright violation] Subject: RE: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright violation] The use of my work is clearly violated. There is no possible way that the work is used on that website with the exact code provided on my website. Please view http://images.ronsnexus.com/mothafuckest.htm The exact statement is "Reuse other than use with this code is prosecutable by law". Sillydog.org only allows use of BBCode in its for which would require the script be changed from the following:

Get this image free
to the following: [img]http://images.ronsnexus.com/mothafuckest.PNG][url]http://images.ronsnex us.com/mothafuckest.htm[/url][/img] [URL=http://images.ronsnexus.com/mothafuckest.htm]Get this image free[/url] Even then, the image is not displayed as centered. With this, the site still is unable to use the exact code, thus violating the notice. Additionally, at the time of your investigation, the website was still offline, which they conveniently had to do "maintenance". Though in there history, the site has never been known to completely shut down for updates or maintenance. With this stated, I would like to request a second investigation of this matter. Thanks -----Original Message----- From: Copyright [mailto:Copyright@theplanet.com] Sent: Friday, June 16, 2006 5:11 PM To: ron@ronsnexus.com Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org Subject: FW: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright violation] To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of Policy Enforcement Posted At: Friday, June 16, 2006 7:07 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright violation] Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright violation] For your review. Thank you, Policy Enforcement The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ -------- Original Message -------- Subject: [ABUSE] copyright violation Date: Fri, 16 Jun 2006 03:41:08 -0400 From: Ron Williams To: Hello, I have tried resolving the issue with the violator Antony Shen regarding use of my content illegally, however this has failed and has caused me as my last resort before taking legal action, to contact his host to have the content removed. Below is an e-mail that was sent to Antony Shen on 6/12/06, 6/13/06, and 6/14/06. Attention Antony Shen and/or owner of the domain name sillydog.org. This letter serves as a notification for cease and desist under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C.
